Review_Summary: I had the same machine earlier also, but the older model 2009. Last 12 years, not even had trouble once. Recently got some issue, so have to fix it. Jus fascinated by the interrupted performance, bought a new one as well. Very good one and noticed the new model takes very less time as well to finish the job comparing old model...I'm a happy customer.

It is probably the highest rated grinder and looks nice.Pros:Looks elegantGrinds fastSupposedly long lastingCons:The batter splashes a lot and comes out of the drum even when covered with the lid and covers the motor.Cleaning is a pain, it is not friendly to clean.Premium price, similar products from other reputed brands are at least 20% cheaper.
